interactives.title: Welcome to Grafana
interactives.summary: Take a guided tour of Grafana's key areas. Perfect for getting started and understanding where everything is located.

interactives.title: Welcome to Grafana (JSON)
interactives.summary: Take a guided tour of Grafana's key areas. This is the JSON-based version of the welcome guide.

interactives.title: JSON Guide Demo - All Block Types
interactives.summary: Comprehensive demo showcasing all JSON guide block types: markdown, html, images, videos, sections, interactive steps, multistep, and guided blocks.

interactives.title: Welcome to Grafana Cloud
interactives.summary: Take a guided tour of Grafana Cloud's key areas. Perfect for getting started and understanding where everything is located.

interactives.title: Welcome to Grafana Cloud (JSON)
interactives.summary: Take a guided tour of Grafana Cloud's key areas. JSON-based version.

interactives.title: Advanced Prometheus Queries
interactives.summary: Master advanced PromQL patterns including aggregations, histograms, predictions, and SLO calculations. Queries can be customized with Assistant for your datasources.

interactives.title: Advanced Prometheus Queries (JSON)
interactives.summary: Master advanced PromQL patterns. JSON-based version.

interactives.title: Prometheus & Grafana 101
interactives.summary: Learn to use Prometheus and Grafana to monitor your infrastructure. Perfect for getting started and understanding where everything is located.

interactives.title: Prometheus & Grafana 101 (JSON)
interactives.summary: Learn to use Prometheus and Grafana to monitor your infrastructure. JSON-based version.

interactives.title: Loki & Grafana 101
interactives.summary: Continue from the Prometheus tutorial: configure Loki and add a logs panel to your existing dashboard.

interactives.title: Loki & Grafana 101 (JSON)
interactives.summary: Continue from the Prometheus tutorial: configure Loki and add a logs panel to your existing dashboard. JSON-based version.

interactives.title: Create your first dashboard
interactives.summary: Learn to create a dashboard in Grafana. Covering features such as Explore, dashboard creation, visualizations and more

interactives.title: Create your first dashboard (JSON)
interactives.summary: Learn to create a dashboard in Grafana. JSON-based version.

interactives.title: Create your first dashboard in Grafana Cloud
interactives.summary: Learn to create a dashboard in Grafana Cloud. Covering features such as Explore, dashboard creation, visualizations and more

interactives.title: Create your first dashboard in Grafana Cloud (JSON)
interactives.summary: Learn to create a dashboard in Grafana Cloud. JSON-based version.
